titles.title: EASE with 211 Act
EASE with 211 Act
Enhancing Access to Support and Emergency Services for Individuals with Developmental Disabilities through 211
A bill to establish a grant program to facilitate nationwide accessibility and coordination of 211 services relating to developmental disabilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
